bibl.title: Two Documents from the Abbey of Montserrat.
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: P. Monts. Roca Inv. 707 verso = P. Gascou 64. List of assignments of garments and textile [Coptic and Greek]. Hermopolite (?), 6th/7th c. - Inv. 707 recto = P. Gascou 65. Fragment of a document (letter?) [Greek]. Hermopolite (?), 6th c. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.13 / 141.4 P. Monts. Roca Inv. 707 verso = P. Gascou 64 141.4 P. Monts. Roca Inv. 707 recto = P. Gascou 65
Sofía Torallas Tovar, Two Documents from the Abbey of Montserrat.
Jean-Luc Fournet & Arietta Papaconstantinou (edd.), Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P. Gascou) = TravMém 20 (2016) 1, pp. 419-428, 2 figg.; - 661.

P. Monts. Roca Inv. 707 verso = P. Gascou 64. List of assignments of garments and textile [Coptic and Greek]. Hermopolite (?), 6th/7th c. - Inv. 707 recto = P. Gascou 65. Fragment of a document (letter?) [Greek]. Hermopolite (?), 6th c. - Avec résumé en anglais.
